General.Name: Team Young Advanced Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Team Young Technology Co.,Ltd. provides smart power control solutions in Taiwan. Its products include power vehicle system; safe building systems, such as outlet sockets, adapter plugs, power strips, remote controllers, electric roll-up doors, electronic door locks, partition door locks, electronic door lock controllers, power switches, electric curtains, air conditioning controllers, and repeaters; and memory alloy bike locks and electronic keys. The company was founded in 1990 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 400, Huanbei Road, Taoyuan City, Taiwan, 320
